shortdesc.ph: Publishes the local stream to a specified CDN live address. (CDN live only.)

section.p: After calling this method, you can push media streams in RTMP or RTMPS protocol to the CDN. The SDK triggers the callback on the local client to report the state of adding a local stream to the CDN.

ul.li: Call this method after joining a channel.
Ensure that you enable the RTMP Converter service before using this function. See Prerequisites in the advanced guide Push Streams to CDN.
This method takes effect only when you are a host in live interactive streaming.
This method adds only one stream CDN streaming URL each time it is called. To remove multiple URLs, call this method multiple times.
Agora supports pushing media streams in RTMPS protocol to the CDN only when you enable transcoding.

plentry.pd: @param url The CDN streaming URL in the RTMP or RTMPS format. The maximum length of this parameter is 1024 bytes. The CDN streaming URL must not contain special characters, such as Chinese language characters.

pd.p:
enableTranscoding Transcoding sets the audio and video profiles and the picture-in-picture layout for the stream to be pushed to the CDN. It is often used to combine the audio and video streams of multiple hosts in a CDN live stream. 多适用于频道内有多个主播，需要进行混流、合图的场景。
: 转码。
false: Disable transcoding.
pd.note: If you set this parameter as , ensure that you call the method before this method.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
#ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT (-2): The CDN streaming URL is NULL or has a string length of 0.
#ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED (-7): You have not initialized the RTC engine when publishing the stream.
